scripts.build-js: yarn run build-framework && yarn run build-app
scripts.build-amd64: yarn run build-framework && yarn run build-app && vgo generate -tags js && vgo build -v -ldflags="-H windowsgui" -tags js
scripts.build-386: yarn run build-framework && yarn run build-app && vgo generate -tags js && set GOARCH=386&& set GOOS=windows&& set CGO_ENABLED=1&& vgo build -ldflags="-H windowsgui" -v -tags js
